A white semi-truck is at the center of the formation, with several military-style vehicles and cars arranged to its left and right, all occupying the middle ground. The camera then zooms out to an extremely wide shot, causing the convoy to appear smaller while remaining in the center. Simultaneously, the five green military vehicles are briefly highlighted with a white digital overlay.
